A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Very disappointing.  Smoke\, Captain Phasma and now Benicio Del Toro's character have been complete wastes.  Worst of all\, they took Luke Skywalker's character in a terrible direction.  The chase involving space ships equipped with training wheels was new though.  And it would not be Disney without plenty of cross marketing - who could have guessed it would be Mary Poppins.
